text: Chip and Joanna Gaines have been happily married for 14 years. Mireya Acierto / Contributor / Getty Images The INSIDER Summary : Recently, ` ` Fixer Upper'' stars Chip and Joanna Gaines have been slammed with rumors about their marriage. On August 4, Chip took to Twitter to shut down rumors that he and Joanna are getting divorced. In response to a fan who tweeted, ` ` I'm so sick of these'stories'claiming @ joannagaines and @ chippergaines breaking up,'' Chip wrote : ` ` Won't ever happen.. you can take that to the bank! # loveOfMyLife.''
